headline: Steel Casting Market Size to Worth USD 66.80 Billion by 2035 - Exclusive Report by Towards Chemical and Materials
summary: The global steel casting market is projected to grow from USD 38.99 billion in 2025 to USD 66.80billion by 2035, growing at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 5.53% over the forecast period from 2026 to 2035. Top key players in the steel casting market are Eagle Alloy, ArcelorMittal, Precision Castparts Corp. (U.S.) Doosan Corporation (South Korea), Kobe Steel, Ltd. (Japan), Nucor Corporation (U.S.), Isgec Heavy Engineering Ltd. (India), The Japan Steel Works, LTD. (Japan), Nelcast Limited
